text: obata pera visu (apage) dutayin bohomayak denada, (mese) borukarayin yayima kiyanu læbuha. ovunta apage udavva pæminena tek ovun borukarayin yayi duk vedana gena dima ovun sthiravatva ivasa vinda dara gatha. (ebævin nabiye! obat e andamatama ivasa sitinu). allahge porondu kisivekutat venas kala nohæka. (obata pera siti apage) dutayinge (mevæni) puvat, niyata vasayenma oba veta pæmina ætteya
